verses.verse: Then I lifted <S%H5375><s%> up my eyes <S%H5869><s%> and looked, <S%H7200><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> [there was] a man <S%H376><s%> with a measuring <S%H4060><s%> line <S%H9112><s%> in his hand. <S%H3027><s%>

So I said, <S%H559><s%> "Where <S%H575><s%> are you going <S%H1980><s%>?" And he said <S%H559><s%> to me, "To measure <S%H4058><s%> Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> how <S%H4100><s%> wide <S%H7341><s%> it is and how <S%H4100><s%> long <S%H753><s%> it is."

And behold, <S%H2009><s%> the angel <S%H4397><s%> who was speaking <S%H1696><s%> with me was going <S%H3318><s%> out, and another <S%H312><s%> angel <S%H4397><s%> was coming <S%H3318><s%> out to meet <S%H7122><s%> him,

and said <S%H559><s%> to him, "Run, <S%H7323><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> to that young <S%H5288><s%> man, <S%H5288><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> 'Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> will be inhabited <S%H3427><s%> without <S%H6519><s%> walls, <S%H6519><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> of the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of men <S%H120><s%> and cattle <S%H929><s%> within <S%H8432><s%> it.

'For I,' declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> 'will be a wall <S%H2346><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> her, and I will be the glory <S%H9202><s%> in her midst. <S%H8432><s%>' "

"Ho <S%H1945><s%> there! <S%H1945><s%> Flee <S%H5127><s%> from the land <S%H776><s%> of the north, <S%H6828><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> "for I have dispersed <S%H6566><s%> you as the four <S%H702><s%> winds <S%H7307><s%> of the heavens, <S%H8064><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>
"Ho, <S%H1945><s%> Zion! <S%H6726><s%> Escape, <S%H4422><s%> you who are living <S%H3427><s%> with the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Babylon. <S%H894><s%>"

For thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> "After <S%H310><s%> glory <S%H9202><s%> He has sent <S%H7971><s%> me against <S%H413><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> which plunder <S%H7997><s%> you, for he who touches <S%H5060><s%> you, touches <S%H5060><s%> the apple <S%H892><s%> of His eye. <S%H5869><s%>

"For behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will wave <S%H5130><s%> My hand <S%H3027><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> them, so that they will be plunder <S%H7998><s%> for their slaves. <S%H5647><s%> Then you will know <S%H3045><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> has sent <S%H7971><s%> Me.

"Sing <S%H7442><s%> for joy <S%H7442><s%> and be glad, <S%H8055><s%> O daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zion; <S%H6726><s%> for behold <S%H2009><s%> I am coming <S%H935><s%> and I will dwell <S%H7931><s%> in your midst, <S%H8432><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

"And many <S%H7227><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> will join <S%H3867><s%> themselves to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> in that day <S%H3117><s%> and will become <S%H1961><s%> My people. <S%H5971><s%> Then I will dwell <S%H7931><s%> in your midst, <S%H8432><s%> and you will know <S%H3045><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> has sent <S%H7971><s%> Me to you.

"And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will possess <S%H5157><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%> as His portion <S%H2506><s%> in the holy <S%H6944><s%> land, <S%H127><s%> and will again <S%H5750><s%> choose <S%H977><s%> Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

"Be silent, <S%H2013><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> flesh, <S%H1320><s%> before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> for He is aroused <S%H5782><s%> from His holy <S%H6944><s%> habitation. <S%H4583><s%>"
